divs: Sighting Details At about 10pm last night I took my dog out for his nightly dutys . I was looking at the sky for any ufos and how the stars had changed positions . My dog wanted in the house NOW . I let him and somethng caught my eye . It was 2 orbs that was hovering by my neighbors yard . I watched it and ( I had my night vision glasses with me ) The orb was round . But when I looked at it without the night vision it had spikes radiating from it . I started to talk to it and it came a little closer . Then it went back to where it was I also noticed that there was a second orb that was smaller to the left of it. it just sat there and did not move . About 20 minutes later I got a call on Skype and I had to answer it so I left the orbs and went into the house . I don't know , But I feel I will see them again Don't ask me why Thank You
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Murray
There were no other sightings in Murray on or around February 26th 2012
